channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 12:15 Failure to alarm to the Kirovohrad region. Watch for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 12:15 Failure to alarm to the Kirovohrad region. Watch for further reports.#Kirovograd This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 12:05 Attention! Dronov-Kamikadze attack
item.description: 🟠 12:05 Attention! Dronov-Kamikadze attack This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 12:05 Threat of Artbill! Now in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire.
item.description: 🔴 12:05 Threat of Artbill! Now in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
